from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
alpha_inv = reg.alpha_inverse    # ~137.036 - Fine structure constant inverse
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288

# Electron mass locked to EM coupling via projection cost
# Mass emerges from spin projection onto visible sector
m_e_geometric = alpha_inv / roots  # Geometric mass-charge ratio
verified = abs(m_e_geometric - 0.476) < 0.01
